fixed it though
uninstall gdm - or do you want to be able to run it?
I want to run it
sysv-rc-conf is a package which can edit the runlevels for you.  untick 'gdm' in level 2.
is that in /etc?
it's a package - install it.
cant, i am modifing the livecd
in that case, you can just remove /etc/rc2.d/*gdm
but isnt there a file I can edit, so it will properly disable gdm?
gdm runs when you boot because of the presence of /etc/rc2.d/*gdm ; if you remove that link, it won't run at boot, but will still be runnable by hand.
good enough thanks:)
you said earlier that you didn't want to disable gdm, because you want to be able to run it
